verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%> to <S%G5371>Philemon<s%> our <S%G27>beloved<s%> [brother] and <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>worker,<s%>
and to <S%G682>Apphia<s%> our <S%G79>sister,<s%> and to <S%G751>Archippus<s%> our <S%G4961>fellow<s%> <S%G4961>soldier,<s%> and to the <S%G1577>church<s%> in your house: <S%G3624><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you in my <S%G4335>prayers,<s%>

because I <S%G191>hear<s%> of your <S%G26>love,<s%> and of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints;<s%>

[and I pray] that the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1756>effective<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> which is in you for Christ's <S%G1519>sake.<s%>

For I have come to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G3874>comfort<s%> in your <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4698>hearts<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> have been <S%G373>refreshed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> you, <S%G80>brother.<s%>
<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> though I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>enough<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2004>order<s%> you [to do] that which is <S%G433>proper,<s%>

yet for love's <S%G1223>sake<s%> I <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3870>appeal<s%> [to you] – since I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>person<s%> as <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> the <S%G4246>aged,<s%> and <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> –
I <S%G3870>appeal<s%> to you for my <S%G5043>child,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> in my <S%G1199>imprisonment,<s%> <S%G3682>Onesimus,<s%>
who <S%G4218>formerly<s%> was <S%G890>useless<s%> to you, but <S%G3570>now<s%> is <S%G2173>useful<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to you and to me.
And I have <S%G375>sent<s%> him <S%G375>back<s%> to you in <S%G846>person,<s%> that is, [sending] my very <S%G4698>heart,<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1014>wished<s%> to <S%G2722>keep<s%> with me, that in your <S%G5228>behalf<s%> he might <S%G1247>minister<s%> to me in my <S%G1199>imprisonment<s%> for the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

but <S%G5565>without<s%> your <S%G1106>consent<s%> I did not <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>anything,<s%> that your <S%G18>goodness<s%> should not be as it were by <S%G318>compulsion,<s%> but of your own <S%G1595>free<s%> <S%G1595>will.<s%>

For <S%G5029>perhaps<s%> he was for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G5563>parted<s%> [from you] for a <S%G5610>while,<s%> that you should <S%G568>have<s%> him <S%G568>back<s%> <S%G166>forever,<s%>

<S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> as a <S%G1401>slave,<s%> but <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> a <S%G1401>slave,<s%> a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> to me, but <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> to you, <S%G2532>both<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> you <S%G2192>regard<s%> me a <S%G2844>partner,<s%> <S%G4355>accept<s%> him as [you would] me.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> he has <S%G91>wronged<s%> you in <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>way,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3784>owes<s%> you <S%G5100>anything,<s%> <S%G1677>charge<s%> that to my <S%G1677>account;<s%>

I, <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> am <S%G1125>writing<s%> this with my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> I will <S%G661>repay<s%> it <S%G2443>(lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should <S%G3004>mention<s%> to you that you <S%G4359>owe<s%> to me <S%G2532>even<s%> your <S%G4572>own<s%> <S%G4572>self<s%> as <S%G4359>well<s%>).
<S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> let me <S%G3685>benefit<s%> from you in the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G373>refresh<s%> my <S%G4698>heart<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3982>Having<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in your <S%G5218>obedience,<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, since I <S%G3609>know<s%> that you will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say.<s%>

And at the <S%G260>same<s%> <S%G260>time<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2090>prepare<s%> me a <S%G3578>lodging;<s%> for I <S%G1679>hope<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> your <S%G4335>prayers<s%> I shall be <S%G5483>given<s%> to you.
<S%G1889>Epaphras,<s%> my <S%G4869>fellow<s%> <S%G4869>prisoner<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you,
[as do] <S%G3138>Mark,<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus,<s%> <S%G1214>Demas,<s%> <S%G3065>Luke,<s%> my <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>workers.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with your <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
